name: Tanaka Torahiko no Ultra-ryuu Shougi: Ibisha Anaguma-hen
overview: Tanaka Torahiko no Ultra-ryuu Shougi - Ibisha Anaguma-hen is a shogi game endorsed by Tanaka Torahiko in which the player will learn about shogi tactics from beginners level to more advanced one. The game also features vs computer and vs another human player matches modes.
